actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to prohibit the assignment of international security assistance management teams, defense attaches, or other United States Armed Forces personnel to the Republic of South Africa.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to prohibit the assignment of any U.S. Armed Forces personnel to South Africa.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to prohibit the assignment of international security assistance management teams, defense attaches, or other United States Armed Forces personnel to the Republic of South Africa.
